official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act with respect to reimbursement of physicians' services in teaching hospitals.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to exclude from inpatient hospital services provided under such title the services of a physician in a teaching hospital only if: (1) the hospital elects to receive any payment due under Medicare for reasonable costs of such services; and (2) all physicians in the hospital agree not to bill charges for professional services rendered in such hospital to individuals covered by Medicare.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act with respect to reimbursement of physicians' services in teaching hospitals.
